description: The Targus 90W AC Laptop Charger with USB Fast Charging Port allows you to quickly charge a laptop and tablet or smartphone at the same time. Sized for travel, this charger is 25 percent smaller than most conventional power bricks and comes with a 2.1A USB Fast Charger that connects right to the cable which makes it easy to plug in a USB compatible device, including an iPad or tablet, and charge it alongside the laptop. Featuring built-in surge protection to keep all of your mobile devices safe from unexpected surges and spikes, this reliable adapter includes 7 connector tips to support Acer, Asus, Compaq, Dell, Fujitsu, Gateway, HP, IBM, Lenovo, Panasonic, Sony and Toshiba right out of the box. This charger is also compatible with iPad, iPad 2, leading tablet devices, the iPhone, BlackBerry, Android and other devices with USB charging capability.
title: Targus 90 Watt AC Laptop Charger with USB Fast Charging Port
